General.Name: Phoenix Solar Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: Phoenix Solar Aktiengesellschaft operates as a photovoltaic system integrator worldwide. It plans, develops, builds, and operates utility-scale, commercial, and industrial photovoltaic plants. The company is also involved in the wholesale of turnkey solar power plants and systems, modules, mounting systems, and accessories, as well as other support services. The company was formerly known as Phönix SonnenStrom AG and changed its name to Phoenix Solar Aktiengesellschaft in June 2007. Phoenix Solar Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Sulzemoos, Germany.
